main.name: Chin Yi Xiang
main.description: I am a Software Developer with 4 years expeirence in ERP software and trained in Data Science.
main.bio: My main focus is in python development (server side and Data Science tools) and Javascript (ReactJS for apps and frontend development). I am a result focused person, who focus on problem solving and practical solutions.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: MASTER OF SCIENCE (DATA SCIENCE AND ANALYTICS)
education.description: Trained in Big Data Analytics, IoT, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning, IoT, Business Analytics, etc.
In depth learning of fundamental physics, electronics, and lab skills.

work.title: Backend Developer
work.description:
Develop custom Modules to Fulfill Customer Requirement, API Integration with 3rd Party Platforms, Provide Technical Support for Team.

Tools used: Python, NodeJS, ReactJS, React Native, Expo

work.title: Technical Executive
work.description:
System Configuration, Hardware Integration, UI Configuration, Database Design, Data Cleaning and Uploading, Technical Support

Tools used: Basic Javascript, Basic Python, Microsoft Excel and VBA

work.title: Tutor
work.description:
Guide primary school students on Olympiad Mathematics syllabus. 
Involved in setting questions for:
1. 2017 International Olympiad Mathematics Contest Year 8
2. 2017 International Olympiad Science Contest Lower Secondary
3. 2018 National Olympiad Mathematics Contest Year 8
4. 2018 National Olympiad Science Contest Lower Secondary
